revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U1G8F2BTR-BC; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial (NOR) |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25Q16CLSQ; |flash2size = 2 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G83GFR-RDC; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''Promise Technology'' Apollo Personal Cloud Storage 2TB ‎(PRMAPOLLO-02TB)
<small>"PROMISE", "TECHNOLOGIES INC.", "AUGUSTA Controller Board", "GP 1526-01 REV A3", :and "G450402HFCAA300" are silkscreened on the board.</small>
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6810 @1.0GHz :''Armada 380'' ARM (Cortex-A9) *Storage: 2MB Serial (NOR) Flash, :128MB NAND Flash, 2TB SATA 3.0 *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports :(one inaccessible w/ case) *Power: 12V/3A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.promise.com/DownloadFile.aspx?DownloadFileUID=4417 Product manual] *[https://www.macrumors.com/review/review-promise-technology-apollo/ ''Review: Promise Technology's Apollo Offers Private Cloud Storage'' on '''MacRumours'''] *[https://www.macworld.com/article/229574/apollo-cloud-review-a-personal-cloud-storage-alternative-to-icloud-photo-library.html ''Apollo Cloud review'' on '''Macworld''']
==Pictures== <center>'''[[User:RayKnight]] Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Promise Apollo Cloud Top.jpeg|Board top File:Promise Apollo Cloud Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
